articles.title: Data breach at credit check giant 700Credit affects at least 5.6 million
articles.description: 700Credit, a company that runs credit checks and identity verification services for auto dealerships across the U.S., had a data breach that allowed a hacker to steal names, addresses, dates of birth, and Social Security numbers.

articles.description: OTTAWA — On Thursday, Michael Ma became the second Conservative MP to cross the floor to the Liberal caucus in as many months. articles.title: Trump’s AI executive order promises ‘one rulebook’ — startups may get legal limbo instead
articles.description: Trump signed an AI executive order targeting state laws and promising one national rulebook. Critics warn it could trigger court battles and prolong uncertainty for startups while Congress debates federal rules.
